original: Åhlund, Frans Andreas, överste, Göteborg, f. 21/11/88 i Foss, Gbgs o. Boh. 1., av majoren Carl Mathias A. o. Anna Alaria Jensen. — KHS. Und :löjtn. v. Boh. reg. 10, löjtn. 15, kapten 25, major i armén 34, major v. Älvsh. reg. 36, överstelöjtn. v. Norrb. reg. 38, v. Älvsb. reg. 40, överste på arméns res :-stat 41. RSO.
translated: Åhlund, Frans Andreas, Colonel, Gothenburg, b. 21/11/1888 in Foss, Gothenburg and Bohuslän County, 1st district, to Major Carl Mathias A. and Anna Alaria Jensen. - Completed Royal Military Academy. Served as: Second Lieutenant in Bohuslän regiment 1910, Lieutenant in 1915, Captain in 1925, Major in the army 1934, Major in Älvsborg regiment 1936, Lieutenant Colonel in Norrbottnian regiment 1938, in Älvsborg regiment 1940, Colonel in the army reserves in 1941. Awarded the Royal Order of the Seraphim (RSO).
